content: cute little corn that s a dog -supplies needed/used bernet velvet yarns and or red heart super saver yarn- colors yellow and green can use other yarn brands -yarn needle -scissors -polyester stuffing/fiberfill -stichmarker -safety eyes -hook size - 4 5mm 3 75mm for smaller yarn you can also buy it on my etsy for $2 50 to support me maplewallcrafts
